title: nishapeni

content: hi need a short term loan of 0.005 btc.will payit back , when i get paid from the campaign in 2 weeks.help will be much appreciated

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: first lesson of economics. if you need $160 but can get hold of $160 in 2 weeks. just wait 2 weeks and pay what you need with your own fundsdoesnt matter if it is medical bill or household utility bill.. you will have more success negotiating a delay in payment by asking to pay in 2 weeks, rather than trying to scam/scheme money from strangers that cant trace you when you abscondfind the funds via family or friends

comments.author: blckhawk
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on October 28, 2023, 07:43:49 AMfirst lesson of economics. if you need $160 but can get hold of $160 in 2 weeks. just wait 2 weeks and pay what you need with your own fundsI know that this is to justify that OP's loan is a bull but in a general sense, this doesn't make sense in regards to loans, if they need that 160 USD today then that means that they probably have an urgent need for the money and that waiting is off the list.I don't know about you OP but your newbie account won't get you any loan here, all the users here are cheapskate and not really keen on trusting anybody which should be the norm here because of scammers which you probably are or you're an alt account or a troll as the other users have stated. Good luck on the loan though, hope you will meet an angel forum user that's going to consider you which would be awesome cause it's unlikely to happen .

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: blckhawk on October 28, 2023, 08:10:49 AMQuote from: franky1 on October 28, 2023, 07:43:49 AMfirst lesson of economics. if you need $160 but can get hold of $160 in 2 weeks. just wait 2 weeks and pay what you need with your own fundsI know that this is to justify that OP's loan is a bull but in a general sense, this doesn't make sense in regards to loans, if they need that 160 USD today then that means that they probably have an urgent need for the money and that waiting is off the list.If he/she needed loan urgently then he/she should not be asking the loan in bitcoin and with a newly registered account (which will slow the process of getting a loan). because He will need to sell that BTC into fiat which will consume a lot of time and this is a forum here communication is slow compared to quick messaging apps. My point is, if he/she required a loan urgently, then it would have been more appropriate to ask for a loan from family members or friends which may save interest and consume very less time compared to asking here.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on October 28, 2023, 07:43:49 AMfirst lesson of economics. if you need $160 but can get hold of $160 in 2 weeks. just wait 2 weeks and pay what you need with your own fundsI can not totally agree with this. There are some people that do not have savings and need emergency fund. The last time I borrowed money, not on this forum, I paid back the following day. It was not up to 24 hours. I did not bother a friend about it because I knew I will be able to pay back the loan easily with the profit. There are sometimes that someone will not have an option.Although I am not saying OP that wants to borrow money is not looking for ways to scam.
